metadata.description: Dark, mysterious, wisp who's best friends with the npc Vellum. Wants you to say NO to drugs.

dialogueTree.text: Stay in the shadows, stay safe. And seriously, say NO to drugs. Vellum and I are on a mission.
Vellum's my best friend. We go way back. Together we spread awareness about the dangers of substance abuse.
Darkness isn't bad. It's protective. Just like making good life choices. NO DRUGS!
